alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:34PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Polk and southeastern Dallas Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1233 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Waukee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jordan Creek Town Center around 1240 PM CDT. Urbandale around 1245 PM CDT. West Des Moines and Valley West Mall around 1250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clive, Windsor Heights, Johnston, Grimes, Merle Hay Mall, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center, Saylorville Lake, Des Moines and Saylorville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 70 and 72. Interstate 80 between mile markers 116 and 137. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
